name: Battle Dyzx
description:
This is a really simple game prototype inspired by Beyblade.

You fight as a spinning top against 3 other tops in the arena. Your goal is to knock them out of the arena or stop them spinning.

CONTROLS
-------------------

Player 1

Move: WASD
Jump: U
Redirect: J
Dash: K
Teleport: L

Player 2

Move: Arrow Keys
Jump: NUM4

Redirect: NUM1
Dash: NUM2
Teleport: NUM5

The original prototype was in Love, I updated it to the newest version (11.3 as of writing). I am working a new shiny version of this game in Unity.
